nodes.text: Maltok  was the name of a nekghoul living on Taris around 3642 BBY, when he was killed by an individual affiliated with the reconstituted Sith Empire.

Maltok appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a world boss on the planet Taris. He is not directly involved in any quests, however he can be killed by any Imperial character for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means he was killed.
